CustomField.description: Please confirm that you received an email or letter in which your former lawyer acknowledged that they no longer represent you. I will need a copy of that email/letter uploaded at the end of this conversation in order for our firm to represent you. Will you be able to provide that?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please confirm that you received an email or letter in which your former lawyer acknowledged that they no longer represent you. I will need a copy of that email/letter uploaded at the end of this conversation in order for our firm to represent you. Will you be able to provide that?
CustomField.label: Received an email or letter?
